title: Designing Language Education for Practical Application of Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Learners access the LMS via personal devices (BYOD), with formative assessments monitoring progress. The training focuses on Technology-Enhanced Learning (TEL) strategies applicable to real classrooms.

learning_goals: Learners can perform language learning activities (e.g., vocabulary practice, writing feedback) with over 80% accuracy using TEL tools based on LMS.
Learners can apply and analyze the practical principles of educational technology (value-added, clarity, coherence, tolerance) to real-world cases.
Learners can write a project report designing and proposing TEL strategies suitable for their learning style and classroom environment.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
